mapper.select: SELECT id, notice_id, author_id, content, created_at, updated_at FROM notice_replies WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_replies (notice_id, author_id, content) VALUES (#{noticeId}, #{authorId}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_replies SET content = #{content}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
